title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama official repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a single command-line tool and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM or chat provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chats, file uploads, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama exposing synchronous & reactive APIs; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports streaming chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI pair-programming via Ollama models (code completion, explain, refactor).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for Ollama with real-time streaming chat and model management.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from Ollama OpenAPI spec; go get github.com/ollama/ollama-go.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repository tracking community SDKs for Rust, PHP, Swift, Dart, and more.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of custom Modelfiles for CodeLlama, Phi-2, Vicuna, SQLCoder, etc.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for vector search without external services.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for discussing new models, tools, and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
